name: Salaryman (NickHenley)
description:
Nomikai, karaoke, furoshiki, karoshi - what's not to love about being a salaryman?

Type out legal documents, but be sure to maintain your health, your family life, and your sanity.

Almost complete; some of the end screens aren't done and the reset button doesn't work. Also, one of the audio channels is completely messed up, so I suggest playing with the sound off until I make a desktop version.
